title: Maliceprime
author: Maliceprime
content: Does LHR unlock makes any difference at this time? Because it seems that after the news of the 100% unlock profit have decline even more, its like many miners got woke up due to the LHR full unlock or something.

comments.author: safar1980
comments.body: Quote from: Maliceprime on May 07, 2022, 08:25:10 PMDoes LHR unlock makes any difference at this time? Because it seems that after the news of the 100% unlock profit have decline even more, its like many miners got woke up due to the LHR full unlock or something.Sleeping rigs probably use very old video cards, but for example RX 470 or R9 380. All new video cards are involved in mining, but due to the fall in the price of ethereum, the profit of miners is falling. It takes time for miners to switch to nicehash, but not many miners will do this.

comments.author: Pendrak
comments.body: Quote from: safar1980 on May 08, 2022, 12:31:48 PMQuote from: Maliceprime on May 07, 2022, 08:25:10 PMDoes LHR unlock makes any difference at this time? Because it seems that after the news of the 100% unlock profit have decline even more, its like many miners got woke up due to the LHR full unlock or something.Sleeping rigs probably use very old video cards, but for example RX 470 or R9 380. All new video cards are involved in mining, but due to the fall in the price of ethereum, the profit of miners is falling. It takes time for miners to switch to nicehash, but not many miners will do this.NBminer is out with full unlock.

comments.author: 0verseer
comments.body: I think it does make difference as LHRs card has been sold a lot but mostly for PC gaming users for quite some time. Those users can turn on the miner program on their PC and earn a little money on their LHR cards, especially during downtime, going to sleep, etc. Before this LHR unlock, I saw people trade their non-LHR card for LHR one if they only want to game, and receive a cut in price different cause non-LHR have more hashrate = more value in the view of miners. The ETH networks now will be more fluctuating since we have more 'tourists' to the networks and you perceive it as 'woke up sleeping rigs'?

comments.author: FirmWars
comments.body: I heard that Trex also released its own LHR unlock hours ago, haha now every available mining software have supported this unlock, its a shame that this have made ETH mining profits to go crippled now, if BTC keeps falling like this mining won't worth it anymore and those LHR graphic cards won't matter.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: FirmWars on May 09, 2022, 04:20:22 PMI heard that Trex also released its own LHR unlock hours ago, haha now every available mining software have supported this unlock, its a shame that this have made ETH mining profits to go crippled now, if BTC keeps falling like this mining won't worth it anymore and those LHR graphic cards won't matter.Already all the miners have released versions for unlocking LHR. Here are the tests of the new version of the dual lol miner.https://t.me/koliamainer/7136But this will not increase the sales of Nvidia video cards. This will only slightly reduce the profit for older video cards.
